com.bytelightning.opensource.pokerface

Class RequestForFileConsumer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bytelightning.opensource.pokerface.AbsClientRequestConsumer
      • com.bytelightning.opensource.pokerface.RequestForFileConsumer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable, HttpAsyncRequestConsumer<ResponseProducer>

    public class RequestForFileConsumer
extends AbsClientRequestConsumer
    Specialization of AbsClientRequestConsumer to consume a client request for a local static file and which generates the ResponseProducer.
